update tbl_sys_dict set dict_type_code = #{dictTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_type_name = #{dictTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_code = #{dictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_name = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id, dict_type_code, dict_type_name, dict_code, dict_name, sort, remark FROM tbl_sys_dict t where t.dict_type_code = #{dictTypeCode} ORDER BY t.sort
